tool.name: Create a biomaterial
tool.command:
tmp_dir=`mktemp -d -p "@DATA_DIR@"` && chmod a+rx "\${tmp_dir}"
&&
cp '${file_path}' "\${tmp_dir}/biomaterial_input"
&&
@AUTH@
tripaille expression add_biomaterial '$organism_id' "\${tmp_dir}/biomaterial_input" '$file_path.extension'
&&
echo "Data loaded" > '$results'
tool.help:
Add a new biomaterial to the database
@HELP@
